item.title: Using Customer Identity Embeddings (Customer2Vec) to predict Telemarketing success in Banking
item.description: The why Well the why of this blog: - exercising data science - developing new concepts for data products - trying out applications for customer analytics (or, say stakeholder analytics), market research and seo / content marketing The why of this post: - Trying out customer2vec - Playing around with R blogdown - Exercise general predictive analytics workflow Letâ€™s use the reknown case about predicting effectiveness of a direct marketing intervention of a bank from the UCI ML repository (find it here: https://archive.
